desc: Your artisan cheese shop in Dubai. Browse our online cheese room to select our excellent artisan French, British, Italian, Dutch or Swiss cheeses or visit our renowned cheese shop in Dubai where our cheesemongers will assist you and walk you through our cheeseboards and best cheese selections.

layout.text: Celebrating artisan cheese one cheese at a time.

At Maison Morand, we are passionate about sharing our love and knowledge of cheese, charcuterie, accompaniments, pairings - and everything in between. Every day in our store, our cheesemongers impart not only their knowledge of cheese making, care and ripening, but also the unique stories behind the history, origins and nuances of the cheeses. Come by our cheese shop in Dubai!
